sentences.en: " Why did you invade China? " I retorted.
sentences.cn: “ 为什么你们要侵略中国? ” 我反问到.

sentences.en: Could CJD Invade the Blood Supply?
sentences.cn: CJD能威胁血液供应 吗 ?

sentences.en: He ordered the army to invade at dawn.
sentences.cn: 他命令军队在拂晓入侵.

sentences.en: I don't want to invade your private life unnecessarily.
sentences.cn: 我不想过多地干涉你的私生活.

sentences.en: If the enemy dare to invade us, we'll deal them head - on blows .
sentences.cn: 敌人胆敢进犯, 我们就给以 迎头痛击.

sentences.en: She sat at the window watching the evening invade the avenue.
sentences.cn: 她坐在窗口,凝视着夜幕渐渐笼罩在林荫道上.

sentences.en: The decision to invade North Africa necessitated a complete reversal in our thinking.
sentences.cn: 进攻北非的决定,要求我们在思想上完全转变.

sentences.en: The enemy troops are ready to invade.
The general's decision to invade was a costly mistake.
sentences.cn: 将军作出的入侵决定是个代价惨重的错误.

sentences.en: The measures to invade online privacy are also tending to be various.
sentences.cn: 网络环境下对隐私权的侵害方式也呈现多样化的特征.

sentences.en: The press invade people's privacy unjustifiably every day.
sentences.cn: 每天媒体都会毫无道理地干扰人们的生活。

sentences.en: The Romans invaded Britain 2,000 years ago.
This does not allow the mystery to invade us.
sentences.cn: 这个不能允许神秘事物侵犯我们.

sentences.en: We must be prepared at all times to wipe any enemy that may invade.
sentences.cn: 我们要随时准备歼灭入侵之敌.

sentences.en: We'll wipe out any enemy that dares to invade our territory.
sentences.cn: 敌人胆敢来犯,我们就把它消灭.

sentences.en: What right does he have to invade my privacy?
sentences.cn: 他有什么权利侵犯我的隐私？

trans.tran_en: to enter a country, town, or area using military force, in order to take control of it
to enter a country, town, or area using military force, in order to take control of it

trans.tran_cn: 侵入，侵略，进行侵略，蜂拥而入，挤满，（疾病，声音等）袭来，侵袭
